page.title: 08 GHOSTS OF ELLESMERE PORT
page.content: The{ghosts of Ellesmere Port}are found in the{old villages.}One of the most famous is the ghost of{Belinda, which is supposed to haunt the Mill Lane area of Great Sutton.Belinda is supposed to be the daughter of the owner of the mill that used to be in this area, who was killed in an accident in the mill. Many children know of her ghost and sometimes in their play area have a{Belinda Tree where they think the ghost might appear. Sometimes this tree is said to be unlucky. {Other ghosts}in the area include the ghost of{a man on a white horse}at the original Sutton Hall,{the ghosts {of Rivacre Brook and the ghost {of the White Swan Pub.
